data.title: Wonderful place to take the Grandchildren!
data.text: We love to take the Grandchildren to the Sabatini Galley and see what new displays are being shown (they have many during the year)

data.title: Great Exhibits on Display!
data.text: The Art Gallery in the Public Library is AMAZING! They always have something new going in, and for the past 5 years I've been living in Topeka I haven't seen the same things twice.

data.title: A Wonderful Small and Ever Changing Gallery
data.text: The Sabatini Gallery is located within the Topeka Shawnee County Library.  It is dedicated to Alice Sabatini who was a local artist who passed away in the late '90s.  What I like about the Gallery is that it is every changing.  Sometimes the Gallery features oils or watercolors.  I've seen beautiful exhibits of pottery and photographic art.  The Sabatini family does a wonderful job of honoring Alice Sabatini.  Do take some time to visit this lovely Gallery.
